A

addContacts() - Method in class Contacts
addContacts() method is used to add a new contact to App.
address - Variable in class Contacts.Person
address stores address of person (optional)

C

changeContactInfo(int) - Method in class Contacts
Method changes Person object attributes based on which attributes the user wants to change.
checkCommand(char) - Method in class Contacts
This method takes user input and checks that the input is correct input that is needed to move forward inside the app.
checkDublicateID(String) - Method in class Contacts
Method that checks that Personal ID data cannot be added to a Person if it already excists with another Person object.
Contacts - Class in Unnamed Package
Contacts class stores the functionality of our App.
Contacts() - Constructor for class Contacts
Constructor of Contacts is used only once at the start of our app and it creates a single arraylist.
Contacts.Person - Class in Unnamed Package
Inner class Person inside the Contacts class that stores Person attributes and has validation methods which check if user input is valid.
ContactsApp - Class in Unnamed Package
This is a ContactsApp class which is the main class to navigate inside our App.
ContactsApp() - Constructor for class ContactsApp
 
ContactsInfo - Variable in class Contacts
Arraylist with type Person that is used to store every person object and their unique info.

D

deleteContact(int) - Method in class Contacts
This metod deletes Person objects from the program.

E

email - Variable in class Contacts.Person
email stores email address of person (optional)

F

findContact() - Method in class Contacts
Method will find based on ID number if a person can be found in the app.
firstName - Variable in class Contacts.Person
firstName stores first name of person

G

getAddress() - Method in class Contacts.Person
Returns address of Person.
getEmail() - Method in class Contacts.Person
Returns email of Person.
getFirstName() - Method in class Contacts.Person
Returns first name of Person.
getID() - Method in class Contacts.Person
Returns ID number of Person.
getLastName() - Method in class Contacts.Person
Returns last name of Person.
getPhoneNumber() - Method in class Contacts.Person
Returns phone number of Person.

I

idNumber - Variable in class Contacts.Person
idNumber stores unique id number of person
info - Variable in class Contacts
String array that is used to get Person info from the file where our data is stored.

L

lastName - Variable in class Contacts.Person
lastName stores last name of person

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ContactsApp
Main method which is used to navigate throught the app.

P

Person() - Constructor for class Contacts.Person
Constructor without parameters.
Person(String, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Contacts.Person
Constructor with parameters for the filereader so attributes can be added straight from method that reads the data in file.
phoneNumber - Variable in class Contacts.Person
phoneNumber stores phone number of person

R

readContacts() - Method in class Contacts
readContacts() method reads data from a file and brings this data to our App for use at the start of our App.

S

saveContactstoFile() - Method in class Contacts
This method saves all data to file while app is closed.
setAddress(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
setAddress() method sets user input as address.
setEmail(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
setEmail() method sets user input as email address.
setFirstName(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
setFirstName() method sets user input as first name.
setID(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
setID() method sets user input as Idnumber.
setLastName(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
setLastName() method sets user input as last name.
setPhoneNumber(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
setPhoneNumber() method sets user input as phone number.
showAllContacts() - Method in class Contacts
Simple method that lists all the Contacts stored in the App.

T

toString() - Method in class Contacts.Person
toString override to print personal data in a clean and readable way for the user

V

validateAddress(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
Method that checks the validation of the address.
validateEmail(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
Method that checks the validation of the email address.
validateFirstName(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
Method that checks the validation of first name.
validateID(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
Method that checks the validation of Id number based on social security number rules in Finland.
validateLastName(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
Method that checks the validation of last name.
validatePhoneNumber(String) - Method in class Contacts.Person
Method that checks the validation of phone number.
